analysis.key_quote: I am strongly opposed to the New Rule being proposed by The Office of Personnel Management, Docket ID:OPM-2025-0004 which will reclassify 50,000 federal workers which makes it easier for them to be fired for political motivated reasons!
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization and the erosion of trust in government, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
